actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-412.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 253 - 153 (Record Vote No: 403).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3479) to provide for adjustments of royalty payments under certain Federal onshore and Indian oil and gas leases, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3479 (oil and gas lease royalties).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3479) to provide for adjustments of royalty payments under certain Federal onshore and Indian oil and gas leases, and for other purposes.
